Texts.Chs: 嗯？那是什么？保安，你能去看看吗？
Texts.Eng: Huh? What was that? Security, could you perhaps take a look?

Texts.Chs: 如果不立即行动，我们将面临全军覆没的危险！我们不能让任何...东西，破坏我们高贵的共和体！
Texts.Eng: If we do not engage immediately we risk total annihilation! We cannot let whatever this...thing...is tear our noble republic apart!

Texts.Chs: 同胞们......我们的世界面临着前所未有的威胁。就在上个月，我们有五个重要的守护团中心被摧毁了！
Texts.Eng: My fellow citizens... Our collective worlds face a threat unlike any we've seen before. Five major Protectorate hubs have been destroyed in the last month!

Texts.Chs: 那就是^orange;物质枪^white;。适当的给物质枪注入这种毒素，就可以让其阻止祸的传播...
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Matter Manipulator^white;. Properly infused, it could halt the spread of ...

Texts.Chs: 是时候了。我们必需联合起来，共同击退这个奇怪的新敌人，不要再为那些无关紧要的小事争吵不休，否则我们将面临前所未有的危险。
Texts.Eng: The time for action has come. We must join forces now to repel this strange new enemy and stop fighting amongst ourselves over petty nonsense, lest we face unparalleled danger.

Texts.Chs: 为了对抗这一威胁，我建议使用一种从我们称之为“源典”的物质中提取出的毒素。有了它，我们可以将我们最伟大的工具武器化......
Texts.Eng: To combat the threat, I suggest a toxin derived from a rare substance known as Protheon. With it we could weaponize our greatest tool...

Texts.Chs: 特工！拿着物质枪快跑！到安全的地方去！
Texts.Eng: You, Agent! Take the Manipulator and run! Get to safety!
